title: I’ll Take You to My Special Spot
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>So this is your special spot, huh, Kanata. It feels quite cozy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe~, doesn’t it? You invited me to Otonokizaka’s archery range before, so Kanata wanted to take you to my special spot today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>So, what do you usually do here, Kanata?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh? Is there anything we can do here except take a nap....? It’s quiet, the grass is fluffy, and it gets a lot of sunshine.... So what else is there to do but nap?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>How about reading a book or coming up with lyrics....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh.... yeah, Kanata guesses you can also do those things~. But! Let’s just take a nap together today~. Come on, Kanata will give you a lap pillow♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeeh!? No, I’m heavy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s okay, it’s okay. Here, *stroke* *stroke*~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Uuh, my eyelids are suddenly.... so heavy.... Hnnmgh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufu, you must be quite tired, huh, Umi-chan~. What a cute sleeping face♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
